title: Neiman ignition switch and steering lock (62 - 66)

posts.content:
This is a Neiman ignition switch and steering lock with key which I have taken off my 1962 bus. I'm going to install a standard ignition switch. The lock and switch are fully functional although one if the electrical spades needs replacing - currently there is a temporary repair. Apparently these are very rare and were fitted as an option on 62 - 66 vans (with writing around key hole - Spanish in this case I think) whereas there is no writing
I think the part number etched on the side is 211 905 851E with other marks being 2KG Pat No 67007.
on the 67 version.
This item is advertised elsewhere so I retain the tight to withdraw the item if sold.
Additional postage will be charged for overseas delivery.

Did you ever sell this?
I'm interested what it looks like? My van should have one but doesn't


Sent from my iPad using Tapatalk
